languages.text: {n}Джай отвечает вам предостерегающим шепотом:{/n} "Только если для того, чтобы впиться в его глотку. Иначе он заберет эти зубы с собой. Поверь, Пощада умеет мстить".
{n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай отвечает вам предостерегающим шепотом:{/n} "Только если для того, чтобы впиться в его глотку. Иначе он заберет эти зубы с собой. Поверь, Пощада умеет мстить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊低声警告道。{/n}“只有把獠牙插入他们的喉咙时，我才会露出我的獠牙。否则，悯慈会拔掉我的牙齿，把它们当成战利品。相信我，悯慈是那种报复心极重的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊低声警告道。{/n}“只有把獠牙插入他们的喉咙时，我才会露出我的獠牙。否则，悯慈会拔掉我的牙齿，把它们当成战利品。相信我，悯慈是那种报复心极重的人。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの返事は、ささやくような警告だった{/n}「あたしが彼の喉に牙を食い込ませるときだけね。さもなければ、彼はあたしの牙を引き抜き、戦利品として取っておくでしょう。マーシーは復讐に燃えるタイプだからね」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの返事は、ささやくような警告だった{/n}「あたしが彼の喉に牙を食い込ませるときだけね。さもなければ、彼はあたしの牙を引き抜き、戦利品として取っておくでしょう。マーシーは復讐に燃えるタイプだからね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae susurra una advertencia a modo de respuesta:{/n} «Solo si voy a clavárselos en la garganta. Si no, me los arrancará y los usará de trofeos. Créame, Mercy es vengativo».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae susurra una advertencia a modo de respuesta:{/n} «Solo si voy a clavárselos en la garganta. Si no, me los arrancará y los usará de trofeos. Créame, Mercy es vengativo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae vous répond avec un murmure menaçant :{/n} « Je ne les montrerai que pour les plonger dans sa gorge. Sinon, il me les arrachera pour s'en faire des trophées. Croyez-moi, Mercy est rancunier. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae vous répond avec un murmure menaçant :{/n} « Je ne les montrerai que pour les plonger dans sa gorge. Sinon, il me les arrachera pour s'en faire des trophées. Croyez-moi, Mercy est rancunier. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jaes flüstert warnend:{/n} "Nur wenn ich ihm damit in die Kehle beiße. Sonst wird er sie mir herausziehen und sie als Trophäen behalten. Glaubt mir, Mercy ist absolut rachsüchtig."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes flüstert warnend:{/n} "Nur wenn ich ihm damit in die Kehle beiße. Sonst wird er sie mir herausziehen und sie als Trophäen behalten. Glaubt mir, Mercy ist absolut rachsüchtig."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, bir uyarı fısıldayarak yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Dişlerimi onun boğazına geçiremeyeceksem olmaz. Aksi takdirde dişlerimi söker ve ganimet olarak alır. İnan bana, Merhamet kindardır."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's reply is a whispered warning:{/n} "Only if I'm going to sink them into his throat. Otherwise, he'll pull my teeth and keep them as trophies. Trust me, Mercy is the vengeful sort."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae bir uyarı fısıldayarak yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Yalnızca onları boğazına geçirebildiğim takdirde. Aksi takdirde dişlerimi söker ve onları ganimet olarak alır. İnan bana Merhamet kindardır."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
